description: Seeing his roommate fall asleep during Brandon Moore's yoga class, you might think that Jordan Boss isn't getting the most of his relaxation session, but Jordan is mindful enough to know that Brandon's tutelage extends far beyond mere solo bodywork. Brandon specializes in easing the tension in some of those hard to reach areas, and his flexibility is on full display whenever he applies his techniques. Jordan swears by Brandon's lower body relaxation methods, making sure to schedule a hard session at least once a week, though Brandon, true to his name, would certainly recommend more. Enjoy!
title: Yoga Stretched
